Address.value: 5 WESTBROOK CORPORATE CENTER, WESTCHESTER, Illinois, 60154, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Ingredion manufactures ingredients for the food, beverage, paper, and personal-care industries. Sweeteners (syrups, maltodextrins, dextrose, and polyols) account for about 35% of sales, starches (for food and industrial use) around 45%, and co-products the balance. Value-added, specialty ingredients account for roughly one third of sales, with the balance being commodity-grade ingredients. With the majority of sales outside the U.S., Ingredion is a global player with good exposure to developing markets, including Latin America and Asia-Pacific.

value.name: Eric Seip
value.title: Chief Supply Chain Officer & SVP-Global Operations
